h2_title: Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The best way to do this is to stand against the wall at a short-to-medium distance from the boss and have it do its slam with its hand. It will do this by turning to its right with its fist along the ground. Alternatively, you can bait the boss' charge and take a hit to ensure the boss hits the wall.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pungent_Flesh_Chunk.md', within the main section titled 'Pungent Flesh Chunk', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The best way to do this is to stand against the wall at a short-to-medium distance from the boss and have it do its slam with its hand. It will do this by turning to its right with its fist along the ground. Alternatively, you can bait the boss' charge and take a hit to ensure the boss hits the wall.
